title: "AI Helps Explain How Single-Celled Organisms Move in the Desired Direction Without a Brain"
excerpt: "How do simple creatures manage to move to a specific place? Artificial intelligence and a physical model from TU Wien can now explain this. How is it possible to move in the desired direction without a brain or nervous system?"
